ChunkBatcher (autotransform.batcher.chunk)

The implementation for the chunk Batcher.

class autotransform.batcher.chunk.ChunkBatcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher[autotransform.batcher.chunk.ChunkBatcherParams]

A batcher which chunks Items in to several Batches. A chunk size is supplied that determines the size of Batches. A maximum number of chunks can optionally be supplied. If the chunk size would result in more than the maximum number of chunks, the chunk size is increased to the minimum required to create only max_chunks. The title for a batch will have [X/N] prepended to it, where X represents the chunk number and N represents the total number of chunks.

_params

Contains the chunking information along with metadata and title.

Type

ChunkBatcherParams

batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Take filtered Items and chunk them into Batches.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list of logical groupings of Items with associated group metadata and

title.

Return type

List[Batch]

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.batcher.chunk.ChunkBatcher

Produces a ChunkBatcher from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle

Returns

An instance of the ChunkBatcher with the provided params.

Return type

ChunkBatcher

static get_type() → autotransform.batcher.type.BatcherType

Returns
